title: authentication api login endpoint
description: Test the /api/auth/login POST endpoint for successful login with valid credentials, invalid credentials handling, and access denial scenarios.

title: authentication api profile endpoint
description: Verify the /api/auth/profile GET endpoint returns the authenticated user's profile and handles unauthenticated access properly.

title: patients management api list patients endpoint
description: Test the /api/patients GET endpoint to list patients with various filters, pagination, and ensure correct response structure.

title: patients management api create patient endpoint
description: Validate the /api/patients POST endpoint for creating a new patient with required fields, CPF validation, and duplicate prevention.

title: patients management api get patient details endpoint
description: Test the /api/patients/{id} GET endpoint to retrieve detailed information of a specific patient by ID.

title: patients management api update patient endpoint
description: Verify the /api/patients/{id} PUT endpoint updates patient information correctly and handles invalid data.

title: patients management api archive patient endpoint
description: Test the /api/patients/{id} DELETE endpoint to perform a soft delete (archive) of a patient and verify the patient is no longer active.

title: appointments management api create appointment endpoint
description: Validate the /api/appointments POST endpoint for creating new appointments, ensuring conflict prevention and required fields.

title: body mapping api register pain point endpoint
description: Test the /api/sessions/{session_id}/pain-points POST endpoint to register new pain points with required fields and valid intensity range.

title: lgpd compliance api export data endpoint
description: Verify the /api/lgpd/export POST endpoint exports personal data in requested formats and handles missing or invalid patient IDs.
